item.description: It's been a while and this is short notice, but I'd like to have a get together before the holidays are upon us! I hope everyone had a fantastic Turkey Day! I'm shooting for this Sunday (December 11th) at noon. Best Friends (the business that we have our meetups at) is having its anual Angel Tree Fundraiser. They're raising money and collecting food and toys for Baypath Humane Society (for both dogs and cats). If you could bring somethnig to donate, that would be great! (anything is fine - a bag or can of dog or cat food, a toy, money - it all helps! You can even purchase a toy at Best Friends! Meetup members DO get 30% off of retail on the day of the meetup!) If you're able to make this event, Giuseppe, Marcel and I can't wait to see you! If you're unable to make this one, we'll catch you next time! HAPPY HOLIDAYS!! :)
item.name: Small Dogs Holiday Meetup!!
